overview: The arrival of a virus came to show how vulnerable we are, when we meet with the absence. An imposed loneliness, which causes desolation in the hearts that they are waiting for a yesterday to return, and facing the uncertainty of tomorrow.  "Alone" is the transpolation of a feeling in which to say "any time the past could have been better ”. Missing has become a habit with the one that we are going to have to learn to live together.
title: Solos
